page.title: 03Health_E.K. Hospital
page.content: The {Red Deer Day Centre}can take up to one hundred patients each day The hospital not only looks after the elderly and the handicapped,but it looks after others in the community too. An occupational therapy department with specialized"aids to daily living"rooms(bathroom,kitchen and bedroom)and a fully equipped physiotherapy department are in the unit.Chiropody,speech therapy and dental care are some of the other services.There are also several consulting,treatment and recovery rooms. The elderly and disabled-most of whom would not get out of their house much and be lonely-get a chance to chat with each other and play games together.A welfare rights officer will visit the Centre regularly.
